### sol 3:
```
Activation Code PhpStorm 8 (Valid until May 4, 2019)
Working on PhpStorm 2018.1 (according to comments 2018.2 too)

First, you need to do this simple process:

For Windows Users:
Go to C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts
Open it and add this line "0.0.0.0 account.jetbrains.com" (without quotes)

For Linux/Mac users:
Open /etc/hosts file. (go to terminal and type: sudo nano /etc/hosts)
Open it and add this line "0.0.0.0 account.jetbrains.com" (without quotes)

After that, go to PhpStorm > Help > Register > Activation code and paste this code:

K71U8DBPNE---

P.S: Some people said that it only worked without internet connection, so try to disconnect and activate Php Storm,
then you can connect again. For me it's working even if I am connected. Double check if you really modified hosts file,
because Windows can undo your action in System32.

Now you can use PhpStorm until May 4, 2019.
=====================================================================================================================================


=====================================================================================================================================
JetBrains, it's temporally, thank you for helping us to start working and we'll buy a license when we start to earn money enough. =D
Buy PhpStorm license: https://www.jetbrains.com/phpstorm/buy/#edition=personal
=====================================================================================================================================
```
